name: Stanage Edge Ridge Walk from Hathersage

transport.access_summary: Train to Hathersage, short walk from village centre towards Stanage Edge.

ai.summary: A classic Peak District ridge walk along Stanage Edge with wide-open views, gritstone edges and moorland paths.
ai.terrain_summary: Generally good paths with some rocky sections along the edge and occasional muddy stretches after rain.
ai.safety_notes: Take care near the edge in high winds or poor visibility. Some sections can be slippery when wet.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn; on clear winter days the views are excellent but conditions can be harsher.

seo.title: Stanage Edge Ridge Walk from Hathersage â€“ Peak District Hiking Route
seo.meta_description: Plan a classic ridge walk along Stanage Edge from Hathersage. Distance ~10.5 km, moderate difficulty, with superb Peak District views.
